title: Hello Robot Stretch Mobile Manipulator Pipeline
description: Perception → Object Detection/Mapping → Planner (Arm + Base) → Controller → Actuators. ROS1 scaffold for LLM to convert / fill algorithmic parts.

todos.description: Detect objects from RGB-D camera and publish detections
Compute arm + base trajectories given local_map
Execute planned trajectories on Stretch controllers
todos.expected_outcome: Sends controller commands to /stretch_controller/cmd or joint trajectories.
